sent.orig: Carl Aero specializes in aircraft sales, aircraft modifications and certification work for aircraft and aircraft modifications.
sent.trans: 专业的飞机销售，飞机改装以及为飞机和飞机改装提供认证。

sent.orig: For example in the aircraft industry, there are two manufacturers: aircraft manufacturer and regional aircraft manufacturer.
sent.trans: 例如在民机产业中，从来就存在着干线飞机和支线飞机两类制造商。

sent.orig: Let's sell an aircraft carrier complete with aircraft and see what happens. "
sent.trans: 让我们卖一艘航空母舰加上配备齐全的战机给台湾，再看看中国有啥反应。

sent.orig: Aircraft digital lofting design is one of the key methods of aircraft digital design.
sent.trans: 飞机外形数字化设计是飞机数字化设计的关键内容之一。

sent.orig: A aircraft flight control system (FCS) is one of important airborne electric equipment of an aircraft.
sent.trans: 飞机飞行控制系统（以下简称飞控系统）是飞机十分重要的机载电子设备之一。
